Reviews.Title: “Pretty Good Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: holly267
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 24th 28th march hotel virtually opposite sofitel i’d purposely booked 2 boutique hotels offered upgrades booking via hotel 8th floor lifts noise annoy initially fine incredibly hot radiators blast despite temperature arrived fortunately managed completely windows toilet shower cubicle tiniest bathrooms sink outside bedroom saloon type doors close gap middle taller knees wouldn’t fit inside little bathroom fine own privacy husband’s bathroom bigger bath shower combined dark lots dark wood blinds plenty lights clean found beds bedding extremely comfortable temperature dropped freezing 4 days didn’t radiator nice flat screen tv free wifi husband wasn’t noise apart night hear people coming 1230am slammed doors repeated 345am mine noted smell cigarette smoke corridors nonsmoking floor maybe smoke drifting floors staircases leading floor smoking floor inside couldn’t smell main priority street noise didn’t bother husband’s quieter excellent meal evening hotel’s bar friendly efficient service nice menu breakfast ok special bar daytime depressing dark wood dim lighting complimentary teacoffee machine available room” unfortunately constantly ran coffee milk staff rush refill noticed hotel dusty surfaces reading covered dust computers desk dusty write messages hotel car newark airport yellow taxi comfortable journey suv driver overall hotel fine 4 nights i’m i’d stay despite it’s location it’s shame hotel doesn’t offer complimentary breakfast boutique hotels

Reviews.Title: “Overall - a great time!”
Reviews.Author: Pinky88Toronto
Reviews.Content: stayed mansfield past weekend lovely time husband organized surprise trip nyc anniversary friends joined arrived told celebrating anniversary upgraded suite 1008 friends upgraded bought round drinks bar service time especially night sometimes desk staff didnt answers simple questions waitress bar kinda cranky nights pretty nice aveda products bathroom flat screen tvs free wireless internet free coffee tea 247 little lounge lobby windows nice closet desk window seat couches sitting comfy bed minibar selection stuff lovely huge upgrade improvement 1 lighting dim 2 mirror tiny mirror bathroom 4 inches diameter huge length half length 3 heatair cant control heat hotel engineer shut radiators completely roasted night friends froze bathroom pretty deal nicely appointed overall location nice central value 3 nights price 2 id stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, service, amenities, and quiet rooms”
Reviews.Author: Ben B
Reviews.Content: loved loved loved hotel location couldnt perfect nicely appointed mention location service hotels york walk feel warmth sincerity staff staff mansfield extremely friendly downtoearth definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: zed1985
Reviews.Content: stayed mansfield 5 nights feb 2010 arrival check fast smooth hotel staff helpful freindly petite chambre expected designed size cleaned day complimentary tokens eat breakfast hotel nice little pricey probably wouldnt ate didnt tokens hotel 2 minute walk times square perfect location didnt spend time hectic day sight seeing manhatten mansfield perfect relaxing chic comfortable modern hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, average hotel but you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: LittlebobB
Reviews.Content: stayed mansfield five nights nov 09 arrival larger read chambre petite option larger smoking option windows day fine looked website return realised hadnt larger bed comfortable kept clean bit tatty updating noisy floor expect situated 5th avenue building airconditioning didnt wouldve loud night location main requirement definitely recommend hotel cheaper hotels stay especially werent disappointed overall

HotelInfo.Name: The Mansfield
HotelInfo.Address: 12 West 44th Street, New York City, NY 10036
